commands.cmd: /bin/sh -lc 'if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm ci --prefix backend; elif [ -f package.json ]; then npm ci; else echo "package.json not found"; exit 1; fi'
/bin/sh -lc 'if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm run build --prefix backend; elif [ -f package.json ]; then npm run build; else echo "package.json not found"; exit 1; fi'

deploy.startCommand: /bin/sh -lc 'if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm run start --prefix backend; elif [ -f package.json ]; then npm run start; else echo "package.json not found"; exit 1; fi'
